record.description: University of Chicago Varsity Football Squad, 1936. Fourth row: Lopez (assistant coach), Metcalf (director), Dunne (assistant coach), Shaughnessy (coach), Baker (assistant coach), Anderson (assistant coach), and Bock (trainer); third row: Harvey L. Lawson, Robert J. Greenebaum, James J. Cassels, Robert E. Meyer, Jerome Sivesind, Frank S. Wilkes, Jack Woolams, Jack M. Fetman, and Theodore P. Fink; second row: Fred O. Lehnhardt, Lewis B. Hamity, Robert E. Fitzgerald, George P. Antonic, Robert E. Johnson, Kendall C. Peterson, Carl T. Frick Jr., Henry M. Kellogg, Morton M. Goodstein, Sollie Sherman, and Edward H. Valorz; first row: William B. Bosworth Jr., Earl L. Sappington, Clarence A. Wright, William J. Gillerlain, Prescott Jordan Jr., Samuel P. Whiteside Jr., Harmon Meigs, Warren G. Skoning, Omar J. Fareed, and Edward Thompson.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
